history.proof: intros. unfold Zp_invert. destruct (Zp_invert_full x) as [i Hi]. destruct Hi as [H1 H2]. qsimpl.

original: intros. unfold Zp_invert. destruct (Zp_invert_full x) as [i Hi]. intros Hx. specialize (Hi Hx). destruct Hi as [H1 H2]. rewrite H2. apply Zp_plus_zero_r.
